com.pi4j.component.adafruithat

Class AdafruitMotorHat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat
      • com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitMotorHat

  • public class AdafruitMotorHat
extends AdafruitHat
    This class extends the AdafruitHat superclass and handles the specific operating commanding for DC and Stepper motors.
    Author:
    Eric Eliason
    See Also:
    AdafruitHat
